name: claude-hub
description: Personal Claude Code customizations: multi-agent teams, skills, agents, and commands

plugins.name: clean-team
plugins.description: A 4-agent codebase hygiene workflow: organize → style → polish → verify

plugins.name: refactor-team
plugins.description: A 7-agent refactoring team that explores, researches, tests, plans, challenges, executes, and verifies code improvements

plugins.name: implement-team
plugins.description: A 5-agent implementation team: plan → challenge → implement (strict TDD) → security → refactor

plugins.name: diagnose-team
plugins.description: A 5-agent diagnostic team for stubborn bugs and implementation mismatches: clarify → investigate → hypothesize → resolve → validate
